Summary: SAW A FLASHING LIGHT, VERYREPETITIVE, CHANG DIRECTIONS, THEN FLY STRAIGHT UP AND AWAY FROM ME.
divs: Sighting DetailsI AM 56 YRS OLD AND HAVE LOOKED AT THE NIGHT SKY MY ENTIRE LIFE, A LOT. WE WERE CAMPED ON THE UMPQUA RIVER ABOVE THE SCOTTSBURG BRIDGE ABOUT 4 MILES ON THE SOUTH SIDE. ABOUT 9 PM, I LAYED ON THE HOOD OF A STATION WAGON LOOKING EAST. I COULD SEE A LONG WAYS EAST. IT WAS A VERY CLEAR NIGHT, I SAW A FLASHING LITE, LONG WAYS OFF TO THE EAST....3 FLASHES, WAIT 5 SECONDS, 3 FLASHES, VERY PRECISE. EVERY TIME IT FLASHED IT HAD MOVED RIGHT OR LEFT ABOUT 45 DEGREES IN A ZIG ZAG PATTERN...IT GOT REAL CLOSE TO ME AND THEN WENT STRAIGHT UP. I SAW IT FLASH TWICE MORE AND THE LAST TIME IT WAS SO FAR AWAY FROM ME I COULDN'T BELIEVE IT. U TELL ME.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Reedsport
There were no other sightings in Reedsport on or around July 15th 2005
